name: change-chart-appearance
description: Changes the appearance settings for a chart: goal, trend line, data labels, stacking, and pie chart total. Make sure that the `current_display_type` is `line`, `bar`, `area`, `combo`, `scatter`, `waterfall`, `row`, or `pie` before calling this tool.

goal.description: Allowed only when `current_display_type` is `line`, `bar`, `area`, `combo`, `scatter`, `waterfall`, or `row`. The goal settings for the chart. To remove the goal line you should return an object with only `show_goal` set to `false`. Set to null only if no goal settings modification is requested, or not allowed by `current_display_type`.

show_goal.description: Whether to show the goal line.

trend_line.description: Allowed only when `current_display_type` is `line`, `bar`, `area`, `combo` or `scatter`. Whether to show the trend lines. If no trend line modification is requested, or not allowed by `current_display_type`, set this parameter to `null`.

data_labels.description: Allowed only when `current_display_type` is `line`, `bar`, `area`, `combo`, `scatter`, `waterfall`, or `row`. Settings for data labels that are shown right on the chart. If no data label modification is requested, or not allowed by `current_display_type`, set this parameter to `null`.

show_data_labels.description: Global setting to show or hide data labels. If not allowed or should not be changed, set this parameter to `null`.

data_label_format.description: Allowed only when `current_display_type` is `line`, `bar`, `area`, `combo`, `scatter`, `waterfall`, or `row`. The format of the data labels. If not allowed by `current_display_type` or should not be changed, set this parameter to `null`.

pie_chart_percent_visibility.description: Allowed only when `current_display_type` is `pie`. The visibility of percentages on pie chart slices. If not allowed by `current_display_type` or should not be changed, set this parameter to `null`.

total.description: Allowed only when `current_display_type` is `pie`. Whether to show the total value on pie charts only. If no total modification is requested, or not allowed by `current_display_type`, set this parameter to `null`.

stack_type.description: Allowed only when `current_display_type` is `bar` or `area`. The stacking setting. If no stacking modification is requested, or not allowed by `current_display_type`, set this parameter to `null`.
